content.rendered:
A value education session was conducted for school children under Smile Foundation’s Child for Child (CFC) programme at Vile Parle in Mumbai, Maharashtra. Mr. Someshwar Nair and Ms. Dharti Dholariya represented CFC and conducted it for different groups of children in their classrooms.

Smile Foundation visits various privileged schools across India and conducts engaging sessions for the young minds, under CFC programme. Children are sensitized in various causes, value systems and are ushered to realize their importance in growing up as responsible citizens of the country.

During last one year, Smile Foundation reached out to nearly 1 Million privileged children in 900 schools spread across 417 districts of India, through Child for Child (CFC) programme. In addition, their parents and teachers were also involved in the process.
